article.title: Northrop Grumman to Develop Electronic Attack Technology
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Airborne Electronic Attack Integrated Product Team

article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Bethpage, New York, is being awarded a nearly $55 million indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the engineering, technical and programmatic support services for development of products within the Airborne Electronic Attack Integrated Product Team. Products include, EA-6B operational flight software, EA-6B unique planning component, and EA-18G operational flight software.Â The U.S. Naval Air Warfare Center Weapons Division, Port Mugu, California, is the contracting activity.
